summary.span: 提供对等网络功能的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to peer networking functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过暂时性连接，对等互连和解析标识符的方式非常复杂，并且无法访问地址记录，例如域名系统 (DNS) 。How peers discover each other and resolve identifiers is complicated by transient connectivity and the lack of access to address records such as the Domain Name System (DNS). Windows 对等基础结构解决了名解析和名为 PNRP 的对等发现方案的这一问题。The Windows Peer-to-Peer Infrastructure solves this problem with a name resolution and peer discovery scheme called PNRP. 对等名称解析协议 (PNRP) 为对等网络提供名称解析机制。Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRP) provides a name resolution mechanism for peer-to-peer networks. PNRP 旨在以完全对等的方式将名称解析为网络 。PNRP is designed to resolve a name to a network in a completely peer-to-peer manner. 命名空间类中提供了基本 PNRP 功能 。Basic PNRP functionality is provided in the namespace classes. 它们提供了创建对等方并将其注册到对等方的功能 。They provide the ability to create a peer and register it in a of peers. 它们还提供将解析 为其网络终结点、TCP 端口、云和 () 的其他地址标识符的功能。They also provide the ability to resolve a to its network endpoint, TCP port, cloud, or other address identifier(s). 命名空间中提供对等网络的高级功能 。Advanced functionality for peer-to-peer networking is provided in the namespace. 在 Windows Vista 中，PNRP 作为一项按应用程序的要求启动的服务。In Windows Vista, PNRP ships as a service that is started on demand by applications. 此外，如果应用程序或用户希望发布用于远程连接和通信的计算机名称，则会有一个 PNRP 计算机注册服务可由应用程序或用户手动启用。In addition, there is a PNRP machine registration service that can be manually enabled by applications or users if they want to publish machine names for remote connections and communications. PNRP 版本1包含在 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2) 、Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 和带有 Service Pack 1 的 windows XP (SP1) 和用于 Windows XP 的高级网络包。PNRP version 1 was included in Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, and Windows XP with Service Pack 1 (SP1) and the Advanced Networking Pack for Windows XP. 此外，如果在发布计算机名称以进行远程连接和通信时，应用程序/用户可以手动启用 PNRP 计算机注册服务。In addition, there is a PNRP machine registration service which can be manually enabled by applications/users if there is interest in publishing machine names for remote connection and communication.
